    • isDecendant

      protected boolean isDecendant(IAssemblyNodeItem node, IAssemblyDefinition assemblyDefinition)
      Determines if the provided node is a descendant of the assembly definition.
      Parameters:
      node - the node item to test
      assemblyDefinition - the assembly definition to determine as an ancestor of the node
      Returns:
      true if the assembly definition is the node's ancestor, or false otherwise
